page.title: 13TRANSPORT
page.content: The main means of transport in this area is that of the car.Most families own a car. Alnmouth Railway Station is only about ten minutes ride by car, although there is no direct bus service.Trains are available south to London or north to Edinburgh or Aberdeen.A commuter-service with Newcastle is maintained at peak periods during the day. A regular bus service runs down the coast through Howick and Longhoughton to Alnwick,which is extended as far as Newcastle in the summer.Due to recent cut-backs in rural areas,the service is not as frequent as residents might like.
